text: Starve your distractions, feed your focus.
Concentrate all your thoughts on the task at hand.
Clarity comes from focus, not chaos.
Multitasking is the enemy of results.
Distraction is the death of productivity.
A calm mind delivers sharp focus.
Dream big. Start small. Act now.
Your future is created by what you do today.
Don’t count the hours. Make the hours count.
One step at a time gets you far.
Motivation gets you started. Discipline keeps you going.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and achievement.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Little by little becomes a lot.
Win the morning, win the day.
Show up. Even when you don’t feel like it.
A goal without a plan is just a wish.
Set goals that make you jump out of bed.
A year from now, you’ll wish you started today.
Direction is more important than speed.
Ambition is the first step to success.
Success is the sum of small efforts repeated daily.
Big goals need small daily wins.
Change your thoughts, change your world.
A positive mind finds a way.
Failure is not opposite of success, it’s part of it.
Growth begins at the edge of comfort.
Believe you can, and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
